m_szDocTitle: German University Revolutionizes Electric Car Production | Inside 3D Printing
m_szDocSumamry: German University Revolutionizes Electric Car Production Published by Sandra Helsel , November 20, 2014 11:50 am (CNN Money) — Germany’s Aachen University used the world’s largest multi-material 3D printer, Stratasys’ Objet1000 3D Production System, to build a fully functional prototype electric car in just 12 months. Using revolutionary design and production methods, the StreetScooter project was developed by the Production of Engineering of E-Mobility Components of Aachen University. The company StreetScooter was founded in 2010 with the goal of developing an electric car that rivaled conven
